title: Haunted Zyra Q-Plant Has the Wrong Projectiles!
body:
{{champion:143}} When Zyra Has the Haunted Zyra skin active, the projectiles for the long ranged plants resemble those of the default skin(Red) where they used to match her auto attacks(Light Blue). I am wondering if this was changed for a reason or if it is a bug. It is definitely not a client side error as I have asked multiple people and all of them are experiencing the same issue. 

Here is a screenshot of what I am on about. (sorry, imgur is the only thing i knew how to use. I am dumb.)
http://imgur.com/uDRnLvv

Any sort of reply would be greatly appreciated :)

replies.body:
Hey Rolienolie,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! ^-^
